txt.en: Hal Gamgee, cousin of the esteemed Samwise Gamgee, has need of aid in the town of Oatbarton in the Shire, bordering the region of Lake Evendim.

'Merry me, a [placeholder]. You... you heard of our troubles?

'This is wondrous. I had not hoped that you would come, but here you are. There are many folk here who are terrified of the strange things happening; myself included among them.

'If you would help us, I know that we could find a proper way to thank you.'
Word has come for brave souls to make their way to the town of Oatbarton, north of Brockenborings, bordering Evendim.

Oatbarton is north of Brockenborings in the Shire. You will need to follow the path through the Greenfields to reach the town and seek out Hal Gamgee.\n\nHal Gamgee can be found near the centre of Oatbarton.
Talk to Hal Gamgee in Oatbarton

Oatbarton is north of Brockenborings in the Shire. You will need to follow the path through the Greenfields to reach the town and seek out Hal Gamgee.\n\nHal Gamgee can be found near the centre of Oatbarton.
